item.title: Spiel des Jahres 2021 nominations
item.author: contact@recommend.games (Recommend.Games)
item.description: Nominated for Spiel des Jahres 2021 MicroMacro: Crime City 1–4 players, 15–45 minutes, 10+ years, light (1.1) The Adventures of Robin Hood 2–4 players, 60 minutes, 10+ years, medium light (1.7) Zombie Teenz Evolution 2–4 players, 15–25 minutes, 8+ years, light (1.3) Nominated for Kennerspiel des Jahres 2021 Fantasy Realms 3–6 players, 20 minutes, 14+ years, medium light (1.7), 100% Spiel Lost Ruins of Arnak 1–4 players, 30–120 minutes, 12+ years, medium (2.
